TableMapper.name: FinderChartToSiap
TableMapper.desc: Finder Chart v2 - Simple Image Search

VoServiceParam.name: POS
VoServiceParam.desc: The position of the region of interest, expressed as the right-ascension and declination of the field center, in decimal degrees using the ICRS coordinate system. A comma should delimit the two values; embedded whitespace is not permitted

VoServiceParam.name: SIZE
VoServiceParam.desc: The coordinate angular size of the region given in decimal degrees. The region may be specified using either one or two values. If only one value is given it applies to both coordinate axes.

VoServiceParam.name: FORMAT
VoServiceParam.desc: the desired format or formats of the images referenced by the output table. The value is a comma-delimited list where each element can be any recognized MIME-type

VoField.name: externalname
VoField.desc: Short description of the image (image external name)

VoField.name: wavelength
VoField.desc: The instrument and detector used to make the observation

VoField.name: ra
VoField.desc: The ICRS right-ascension of the center of the image

VoField.name: dec
VoField.desc: The ICRS declination of the center of the image

VoField.name: naxis
VoField.desc: The array value giving the length in pixels of each image axis

VoField.name: dataFormat
VoField.desc: MIME-type of the object associated with the image access reference

VoField.name: imageAccessUrl
VoField.desc: The URL to be used to access or retrieve the image

VoField.name: imageAnc1AccessUrl
VoField.desc: The URL to retrieve the image and important ancillary products (mask, uncertainty, etc.) as a zip archive
